questions: Is there a ice cream cone in the scene?
Is the ice cream cone conical in shape?
Is there a sunflower in the scene?
Is the sunflower tall in shape?
Is the ice cream cone painted black?
model_output:
Yes, there is an ice cream cone in the scene; it is at the base of the sunflower.  
Yes, the ice cream cone is conical in shape; it has the traditional pointed shape of a cone.  
Yes, there is a sunflower in the scene; it is the main object depicted and appears several times.  
Yes, the sunflower is tall in shape; it is positioned vertically and occupies a central tall space in the image.  
No, the ice cream cone is not painted black; it has a natural waffle cone color.
